basic_info.title: Russian Government Scholarship at HSE University 2025 (Funded)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed

program_details.description: Full Scholarship with no tuition fee, a stipend, or living allowance. Apply for the **Russian Government Scholarship at HSE University 2025**. The applications are open till 1st March 2025. International students can apply for the bachelor, Master, and PhD programs. There is no separate application for the scholarship. Anyone can apply with simple steps. The HSE is one of Russiaâ€™s Top universities in Moscow and it has campuses in other cities like St. Petersburg, Perm, and Nizhny Novgorod. No Application Fee. **No GRE/GMAT. No IELTS** (English Proficiency certificate from your university is enough). HSE is One of the Top universities in Eastern Europe and Eurasia. This is the best chance to apply for the **Russian Government Scholarship** to Study Free at HSE University.

financial_coverage: Allowance for Accommodation at Student Dormitories

waiver_conditions: English Proficiency certificate from your university is enough

application_process: Apply for admission to a course at HSE University in which you are interested.
Apply as a participant for the Open Doors Russian Government Scholarship.
